name: Linking IT
tag_list: social, network, ranking, profile, persons, places
overview:
Our Enterprise Software Products and Services. What we offer is just what you need.

Linking IT helps accelerate the development of software products and reduce time to market through its proven processes, methodologies, and tools. Our full lifecycle services include product development, testing and QA, sustenance, embedded engineering services, and embedded systems design. Experienced engineers with deep expertise in leading edge technologies help improve the quality and reliability of the products we own for our customers.

Our Business Services Offerings

When considering a business enhancement tool such as a Client Server or Web based application, or if you require Web access to software previously distributed as local application, consider Software Resources. Software Resources is an industry leader, possessing years of experience in the analysis, development, implementation, and maintenance of custom three tier client server and web based applications, spanning diverse industries.

Proven Methodology

Our development methodology was created by experienced Information Technology professionals. This methodology has evolved over the years to be the backbone of our design process and has withstood the test of time.

Benefits

There are numerous benefits to implementing a custom client server or web based application. Ease of Use, Relational Database, Customization, Security, Systems Administration, Customized Reports, Data Access through a browser, simplified deployment and upgrades..

Our Internet Media Products and Services

Our Internet media business is focused on vertical channels covering news, mobiles, games, and socialnetwork.
